mapper.select: SELECT r.id, r.token, r.refresh_count, r.user_id, r.reg_date, r.mod_date, r.expiry_date, m.user_id AS userNm FROM refresh_token r left join member m on r.user_id = m.id WHERE token = #{token}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO refresh_token ( token, refresh_count, user_id, reg_date, expiry_date ) VALUES ( #{token}, 1, #{userId}, NOW(), #{expiryDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE refresh_token SET token = #{token}, refresh_count = refresh_count + 1, expiry_date = #{expiryDate}, mod_date = NOW() WHERE user_id = #{userId}
